choices: Yes, he was alone (only Joshua gets the powers)
No, his family was there too
No, his friends were there too
1.content:
This story begins with a family of sisters. Now these were no ordinary sisters for they were tree spirits. Each sister had their own unique special ability and together they lived happily with the other tree spirits far from civilization. The sister's names, descriptions and powers were:

Maple:
-Caucasian skinned with bright red hair, average height & perfect curves, always dressed in red clothes that look vaguely like they are made from maple leaves
-Can generate energy based shields in the form of huge maple leaves

Willow:
-Caucasian Skinned with Brown hair, tall and heavy build, dresses in greens and browns
-Can grow vine-like branches from hair and arms for use in tying things up/constricting them

Spruce:
-Tanned skin with deep with forest green hair, very tall and thin, always dressed in varying shades of green
-Can fire large masses of steel strength spruce needles from hands at bullet like velocities

Poplar:
-Caucasian skinned with blonde hair, Average height and build, usually dresses in greens and yellows/oranges
-Can generate a cloud of pollen that can be used to knock out those without Spirit powers or to escape in

Birch:
-Pale skinned with yellow-white hair, very thin but not as tall as spruce, at least one item of clothing is white
-Can change appearance to any female form (excluding the form of the other spirits) but must always be wearing one piece of white clothing

Cherry:
-Tanned skin with dark red hair, short and fit, usually wears reds and greens with some purple and yellow
-Can grow cherries from hair that can be either eaten for food or used as grenades

Palm:
-Dark skinned with thick black hair, average height and build, Usually wears tan or green clothes
-Can generate a single club made out of indestructible coconuts as well as a shield made from steel-like palm leaves. Can also call back the shield and club to her hands at any time.

Bamboo:
-East asian skin tone and silky black hair, short and thin, most varied selection of clothes
-Can generate unlimited supply of bamboo spears for throwing, etc. and can dodge attacks well

Baobab:
-Very Dark Skinned with Dark hair, Average height but slightly overweight, usually dresses in yellows and tan colours with some hints of red
-Is invulnerable to most attacks and can regenerate from those that do cause damage

Eucalyptus:
- Pale skinned with blue-green hair, Average height and hourglass shaped body, Dresses in blue-greens, reds and deep blues
-Can produce potions for uses such as: Healing, poisoning and burning through things

Unfortunately, one day the sisters decided to go and visit the Humans. So they took on human forms and set out for civilization. Upon arriving in populated lands they soon caused a ruckus. At first they only used their powers to awe the humans but soon were met by the rigid ideals of the human's religions and had to fight for their survival. Finally they fled back into the forests as the humans pursued. In response to the actions of the sisters, they were imprisoned by their Mother, Nature, in a glass bottle and buried for all of time.

There they waited for many years before their Father, Time, came upon them and offered them freedom if they agreed to give up their forms and powers. They accepted his offer and so he freed their minds and took them off to live with him at the edge of infinity.

Though the sisters had left their glass prison, their human bodies and powers remained behind in the form of a pure essence. And so, as the years passed, the bottle waited until one day it was freed from its dirt prison by a young boy. The boy carried the bottle with him to the grocery store where his father worked where he left it behind. That is where Joshua Tanner found the bottle when he was out shopping.

Joshua mistook the bottle for a bottle of syrup so he bought it and brought it home. There it sat for a few more weeks until one day Joshua opened it for use of waffles.

The first question is, was Joshua alone when he opened it?
1.title: The beginning of it all

11.content:
After pouring out the entire bottle onto the waffles, Joshua (you) chows down. Though you finds the 'syrup' to have a strange taste, you quickly finish the waffles. You then find yourself feeling strangely ill. Stumbling to the bathroom you dry heave into the toilet for a few minutes. When nothing comes out you stumble to your room and flop down on his bed, unconscious.

When you come to you feel strangely different.Looking around you see that the tree outside seemed to look, happy. You wonder how you can tell that the tree was happy but figure it was just your brain playing tricks on you. Sitting up you can tell that your body is different but are not sure exactly how it is different. Looking up at a mirror you are shocked by the reflection that awaits you.

The spirit whose form Joshua woke up as was...
11.title: Joshua alone gains them all

111.content:
In the mirror in front of you you saw a strange and exceedingly beautiful woman. She had bright, scarlet red hair, done up in a bun and held in place with twigs with little maple leaves still attached. She was wearing sparkling red eye-shadow and lipstick and was wearing an ankle length, brilliant red, asymmetric cut dress that almost seemed to have been made from sewn together, oversized maple leaves. On her feet were a pair of red high heeled shoes with maple leaves forming the buckle strap across the ankle. Beyond the clothes and slight makeup on her face, her skin was naturally radiant but was of the usual caucasian skin tone.

Convinced that there must be some strange sort of trick going on you look down only to have a head's eye view of the woman's body. Your eyes widened as you realized the two mounds in the top of the dress were your breasts and that the rest of the gorgeous body was yours as well. You start to freak out and hold up your new, thin arms in front of your face. It was then that something even more shocking happened. A glowing maple-leaf shaped forcefield appeared the instant you had raised your arms. The forcefield was about two feet tall and three feet wide and hovered just above and in front of your head. In your shock you wished that the forcefield would go away and it does.

"Huh," you say, trying out your new voice at last.

You then thrust your right arm outwards and will a forcefield to be projected in front of your palm. You jump slightly when a forcefield suddenly appears. You wonder how much control you have over the forcefields so you try to make it smaller and watch as it changes size to match your desires. Willing it out of existence you start to wonder if you have any other powers. This prompted a sudden change in your body and you looked back at the mirror only to see the new reflection of...
111.title: Maple

114.content:
In the mirror in front of you, you saw a woman looking back at you. She had short, wavy hair that was an unusual dark red colour. Her round face with short, pointed nose and small mouth was staring back at you with burgundy eyes. She was dressed in a dark green t-shirt with purple highlights around the neck and arms. Her red shorts were contrasted by a pair of glossy, dark green flats with little yellow gems on the toe. Her legs were shaved and bare and on her hand she had a cherry shaped ring. You begin to wonder who this strange woman was when you realized you were looking in the mirror. You stand up and step towards the mirror, confirming that the short woman you saw was yourself.

"What the heck?" you blurt out in a playful sounding voice.

Spinning on a heel you stare back out the open window at the back yard. As you began to panic, thanks to your strange new body, you felt as though the tree outside had just greeted you in a friendly manner. Looking back at the mirror you wonder if this all was a rather bizarre hallucination brought about by something you ate.

"But what could cause this kind of hallucination? What?" you scream out in your new voice.

You then began to become hungry, thanks to your pouring over what could have caused you to imagine what you were just now going through. That was when something very strange happened. In the reflection you watched as a small bud grew, flowered, withered and became a cherry. All this happened, shockingly enough, in your new hair. Feeling for it you pulled and picked it off, feeling a slight tingle when you pulled it free of your head. Holding the berry in front of you, you confirmed that it was indeed a cherry of some sort.
114.title: Cherry

choices: wondered if you had any other powers (change into another spirit)
1141.content:
Popping the cherry in your mouth, you take a bite and are awash with the flavour of the sweetest cherry you had ever eaten. Craving more, you wished you had another one. You were shocked to watch a pair of new cherries grow from your hair again.

"Heh, cool!" you say in your cheery new voice.

After eating the new cherries you...
1141.title: Eat the cherry

choices: Your girlfriend, just having arrived to visit Joshua(you)
1142.content:
Shrugging your shoulder, you toss the cherry into your waste bin and are thrown back by the explosion. As you stand up again, bleeding from a few cuts on your hands and legs, the fire alarm goes off.

"Shit!" you mutter, running out of the house, knowing that the alarm system had already called the fire department.

Once outside you find...
1142.title: Throw away the cherry

1143.content: You turn your head and stare at your bedroom door as the doorbell rings for a second time. When no one answers the exterior door, you...
1143.title: Someone rings the doorbell

11432.content: You decide to go and answer the door. After first checking that the hallway was clear you run to the door, trying to ignore the motion of your new breasts. As you pass the juniper tree at the end of the hall you notice that it seems depressed. Shaking your head at your strange ability to tell the mood of trees you go to the door and swing it open, only to reveal...
11432.title: Go answer the door

choices: A cherry grows from your hair (mild distraction)
114321.content:
"Um, hello?" remarked your girlfriend, surprised to find a strange woman with dark red hair and eyes answering the door to her Boyfriend's house. "Who exactly are you?"

"Uh..." you mutter back, unsure what to say.

You wish you could say something to explain things or at least take her attention of off you.
114321.title: Your Girlfriend, Anabelle

1143212.content: What do you do now that Anabelle has seen you as Cherry, the tree spirit?
1143212.title: Do something else

choices: Turn into Poplar, the tree spirit so you can cause a distraction
Slam the door in her face
11432122.title: something else

choices: Release a cloud of pollen fuzz to help in an escape
114321221.content:
You feel yourself grow a bit taller and see Anabelle step back in shock and rub her eyes.

"What just happened?" asked Anabelle, staring at your new body and clothes.

Looking down at your body you are just as shocked as Anabelle to see Poplar's breasts and body where Cherry's had been moments before. Panicking, you...
114321221.title: Turning into Poplar

choices: Your new reflection in the glass of your bedroom window
Your twin sisters, Samantha and Alexandria staring at you
1143212211.content:
Suddenly you are surrounded by white fuzz. You hear Anabelle cough a bit but you are to shocked and scared of what has been happening to care. You turn and run out the back door. As you pass the juniper again it remarks that you sure seem to have made a mess of things before moping about how depressed it is feeling. Once outside you come to a stop beside the Apple tree in the back yard and it greets you exuberantly.

"Why are you so happy?" you mutter to it in your latest female voice.

The tree replies that it is just happy to be alive. It then offers you one of its fruit as a gift. Despite finding it odd to be interacting with a tree in this way, you accept the gift and pick an apple. As you bit into it you turn to see...
1143212211.title: Fuzz-splosion and escape!

choices: Slam the door in his face
Tell Charles you are Joshua's cousin
114322.content:
As you open the door and see Charles standing there, you realize that maybe answering the door wasn't the best idea.

"Uh," says Charles, obviously stunned by your presence in his neighbour's house.
114322.title: Opening the door to Charles

1143221.content:
Once safe again in your own house, you lean against the door and try to calm down again.

"I just wish I could change the way I looked!", you murmur in the Cherry Tree spirit's voice.

Suddenly you felt yourself get taller. Turning to look in the mirror by the door you saw the reflection of a very different woman than the one you had been moments earlier. Your new form was much taller and had very pale skin. You were now dressed in a yellow, plunging neckline T-shirt and white tight jeans. On your feet you wore strangely elegant sneakers and had long, straight and silky yellow-white hair reaching down to just below your breasts.

"What the hell?" you exclaim, noticing the different voice that came with the Birch tree spirit's body.

"Who is there?" you hear a voice call out from your parent's bedroom. You recognized the voice as it belonged to your Father, Tom Sr.

"Shit, Shit, Shit!" you murmur, wishing you could hide somehow before your father discovered you, a strange woman, in his home and his sone missing.

Staring back at your tall, slim reflection in the mirror you wonder what _____ would say about you now...
1143221.title: Slam the door in his face

choices: Shoot stuff from my fingers (turn into Spruce Spirit)
Make spears appear from thin air (turn into Bamboo Spirit)
11432212.content:
Suddenly you see your reflection change again, this time into the reflection of your mother. The only exception was that your eye colour was a bit paler than your real mother's eye colour. Having no time to react, your dad comes around the corner and sees you.

"Christine? Back from your morning run already?" he asked you, mistaking you for your real mother.

"Ummm," you mumble back, "Yes! I, uh... I am!" You can't believe what a crazy morning you were having. First you were a girl that could grow cherries from her hair and now you could morph into other people? What next?

"That's nice!" replies your dad, "I'm going back to bed okay."

"Sure thing, uh, honey!" you reply with your mom's voice.

As soon as your dad went back down the hallway you turned to look in the mirror again, examining your newest reflection. The white sweatsuit you were wearing was styled just like your mom's exercise gear though her clothes were blue. Aside from that and the slightly paler eyes you looked identical to your mom.

"This day sure can't get any stranger!" you comment to the Juniper tree.

"Oh really? I wouldn't know..." it seemed to reply to you depressingly.

"What? Its not like I can..."
11432212.title: Christine, your mother

12.content:
After pouring some syrup onto his waffle, Joshua hands the bottle to his older brother, Tom Jr.. The next person to pour the syrup was Joshua's twin sisters Samantha and Alexandria. Next was Joshua's mother, Christine and his Father Tom Sr.. The following person to have some syrup was Joshua's Uncle Richard and his adopted son Chen. The next person was Joshua's younger brother Adam and finally Joshua's Grandmother Maria.

Shortly after finishing their plates everyone doubled over at the table. There was a race for the only two bathrooms in the house and Joshua was left rolled on the floor outside the hall bathroom in pain. The first person to pass out was Maria, followed by Joshua's Father. Eventually everyone succumbs and passes out.

The first person to come to was you. The question is, who are you?
12.title: Joshua's Family unit partakes in the syrup

13.content:
After pouring some syrup on his waffle, Joshua first passes it to his Girlfriend Anabelle who puts some syrup on her waffle. Next the syrup travels to Kyle, Joshua's best friend, and then to Kyle's younger sister Lucy. Next it goes to Jason and his girlfriend Carla who passes it on to Mike, the group's least talkative and social member. The next person to have some was Bill, the tallest and most athletic of the group followed by Jake, the group's thinnest member. Finally, Charles, Joshua's next door neighbour partakes in the final drops of syrup.

Shortly after finishing their plates everyone doubled over at the table. There was a race for the only two bathrooms in the house and Joshua was left rolled on the floor outside the hall bathroom in pain. The first person to faint was Carla while Anabelle held on the longest, fighting to stay awake and holding tightly to Joshua's still form.

The first person to come to was you. The question is, who are you?
13.title: Joshua's friends consume the syrup too

131.content: You awake to find yourself nestled next to a strange woman. Jumping to your feet you realize that your own body seems to have changed significantly. Looking down you discover yourself in the body of...
131.title: Joshua

1312.content:
Looking down at your body you are shocked by what you see. Instead of your usual caucasian, male body with the slight muscles and slightly bulging tummy you saw the ebony body of a fit woman, dressed in a green, short cut tank top and sandy coloured shorts. On your feet you sported sandals and you had a bracelet around each wrist, seemingly made out of palm leaves. You rest your hands gingerly on your breasts and feel the tingle of your sense of touch, confirming their realness. Snapping your arms off of your chest you start to panic.

"What the hell?" you half whisper, half shout.

The woman at your feet then starts to move and you jump back, bringing your arms up as though in defense and surprising yourself by the sudden materialization of a club in one hand and a shield in the other. Deciding to try and take the appearance of the shield and club in stride you pull the shield in closer and raise the club. Staring carefully at the face of the woman below you, you feel stronger than ever before and are having trouble holding back from attacking.

Then the woman's eyes open and you barely restrain yourself from striking. The woman then locks eyes with you and screams.

(Anabelle was the woman. Now which spirit did she become?)
1312.title: Palm

choices: Offer a truce to discuss things
Attack again! Way to go adrenaline!
13121.content:
At the sound of her scream you can hold back your strange new physical instinct no longer. You swing down the club as hard as you can, making contact with the Anabelle's new head. To both your surprise and Anabelle's the club bounces off of her head, seemingly having caused no damage. As the club flies out of your hand, you fall back and roll back onto your feet. Staying low you watch as Anabelle stands up and turns to face you.

"I wish i still had the club," you think and are shocked when it flies straight back into your hand.

Grinning with pearly white teeth you raise the club in a defensive stance.

"What the hell?" shouts Anabelle, shocked at the presence of a strange black woman in her house as well as by her new body and the fact that your blow had failed to crush her skull.
13121.title: Anabelle is Baobab

131212.content:
You shriek in your new voice and charge, swinging the club again. Anabelle holds up her arms to protect yourself and the club bounces off again, lodging itself in the wall of the hallway. You pull it free and swing again, hitting Anabelle's new belly and watching in terror as the club bounces back and nails you in the gut, throwing you through the wall.

You stand up and recall both the club and shield, which you had dropped in the hallway. Taking a moment to survey your own body you see many slivers of wood piercing your silky black skin. Retaking the defensive stance, you turn back to Anabelle, who is staring at you through the hole in the wall.

"What the fuck?" shrieks a voice from behind you, "I'm a freaking chick?"

You glance over your shoulder only to see that Kyle had turned into...
131212.title: Attack again! Way to go adrenaline!

choices: Yes, Adrenaline is still flowing hard
1312121.content: Do you take a swing at Kyle?
1312121.title: Kyle is Eucalyptus

choices: You are tied to a chair with everyone else standing around you
You are free to move and fully healed
13121211.content:
Swinging back at Kyle's new body, he ducks and Palm's club smashes through your parent's dresser. Kyle then jumps back from you to avoid a second swing. Turning back to face Anabelle (as Baobab) you see a shorter chinese girl (Lucy as Bamboo) standing beside her.

You jump up and raise your club to bring it down on Anabelle for a fourth time only to feel a sudden stabbing pain in your shoulder. As you fall back you look down and see a five foot long bamboo spear protruding from your shoulder. As you land on your Parent's bed you look up and see Lucy (as Bamboo) holding another spear, ready to throw again.

"Holy hell, that hurts," you murmur, dropping the shield and club to the floor as your new blood soaks into the bedsheets.

Kyle takes a careful step towards you, worried that you'd go at him again.

"Would someone just tell me what is going on here?" demands Anabelle, her new voice booming across the room.

Kyle then grabs the spear and pulls it free from your body. As you wince in pain he holds a sheet against your wound, trying to stop the bleeding. He then notices the strange sap like substance that was flowing out of his hands and all over your wound. Though the strange sap stung, you could feel it seemingly mend your wound.

"Uh... That's strange!" murmur Kyle, staring down at you in shock at what was happening.

You then pass out again.

When you come to...
13121211.title: Swinging for a final strike

choices: "Do I look like Joshua?" you snap back, trying to play it safest.
"Yes, I'm Joshua," you admit, hoping for a more peaceful resolution.
131212111.content:
"Joshua?" asks Anabelle, being the first one to speak, "Is that you?"

Shaking your head and struggling a bit in your chair you stare back at her.
131212111.title: Tied down and surrounded

choices: Summon the club & shield and fight again
1312121111.content:
"Not really," replies Bill from behind Cherry's eyes, "But then again I don't look like i usually do either!"

Struggling some more in your chair, you see your shield and club on the floor behind Lucy. Lucy sees you eyeing the club and grows a spear out of her wrist, holding it at the ready. You are a bit shocked by this occurrence and so you...
1312121111.title: "Do I look like Joshua?" you snap back...

13121211111.content:
The shield flies right into your hand, catching Lucy's first spear. You then grip the club tightly as it arrives and snap free of the twig-like ropes binding you. You catch the next spear with your shield again but are left open to Jake's attack with Spruce's needles.

As the blood drips from your needle struck side, you...
13121211111.title: Summon the club & shield and fight again

choices: No, you escape through the window
131212111111.content: As you turn to run, does Mike stop you with one of Maple's forcefields?
131212111111.title: Flee from the scene

1312121111111.content:
The glowing Maple leaf that materialized in front of you was quite the shock. As you fall to the floor, Mike moves the forcefield to hold you against the floor as Carla sends out Willow's rope-like branches to tie your hands once again.

"Please, we don't want to hurt you!" says Charles through Birch's lips, "Now just tell us, are you... Or were you Joshua Tanner?"
1312121111111.title: Down again

choices: "And who might you be?" you ask.
13121211111111.content:
"Yes," you hiss in Palm's voice, the adrenaline receding as you stop struggling under Mike's maple leaf forcefield, "Or at least I was."

Suddenly Anabelle breaks out into tears and falls to her thick knees at your head.

"Oh Joshua!" she weeps, looking down at you, "What happened to us?"

"And who are you?" you ask, only seeing Baobab's body and not knowing it was Anabelle inside of it.

"Oh Joshua!" weeps Anabelle, "It's me! Annie!"

"Anabelle?" you ask, suddenly realizing who you had been attacking earlier, "Oh my God Annie! I'm so sorry!"

"Its okay!" replies Anabelle, smiling down at you, "I seem to be pretty invulnerable now!"

"If I release you, will you attack again?" asked Mike, through Maple's lovely voice.
13121211111111.title: Admit to your true self

choices: The Others Agree, it's Time to Run
131212111111111.content:
"No, I'm calm now. I was just consumed by aggression and I don't know why." you say.

"It's alright, we've gone through some changes." Mike said helping you to your feet.

"Yeah, about that; what the hell is going on!?" Kyle said with Eucalyptus' Australian accent.

Nobody said anything since nobody had a clue. Glancing around at your thoroughly trashed house, the damage you did was pretty bad. Several walls were broken, water was spraying out from somewhere, and it felt like the floor was sagging. Like it or not, there was one thing you were pretty sure of.

"We can't stay here." you say. "There's no way my parents will believe it's us, we need to leave if we're going to find out what happened to us.

"So what, we're going on the run?" Jason asked as Poplar.

"I think that's the best plan." you say.

"I agree, we need to get out of here. We'll probably be arrested if we stay." Annabelle said.
131212111111111.title: "No," you reply.

132.content: You awake to find yourself nestled next to a strange woman. Jumping to your feet you realize that your own body seems to have changed. Who are you now?
132.title: Anabelle awakes

choices: realize that the girl you awoke next to used to be Joshua, your old boyfriend
1321.content: Looking down at your body you find yourself to be much taller than you had been before. Not only that but your skin was almost white coloured. You were dressed in a tight fitting, yellow-white one-shoulder dress that matched the long, shiny hair draped over your other shoulder. On your feet were a pair of white stilettos. Wanting to know more about your current form, you walk over to the front hallway where you find a mirror near another unconscious woman. Stepping carefully in front of the mirror you see your full body front on for the first time. Your face was elongated and thin though still quite beautiful. Overall you appeared to be a strangely tall and exceptionally pale skinned woman dressed for some sort of formal occasion.
1321.title: Birch

13211.content:
Suddenly you watched as you shrunk back down to your old height.

"I wonder what else I can change," you wonder...
13211.title: Wish you were shorter

134.content: You awake only to find yourself on the floor of the bathroom and in a strange body. Pushing yourself to your feet you discover that you are now...
134.title: Bill awakes

1341.content:
In the mirror in front of you, you saw a woman looking back at you. She had short, wavy hair that was an unusual dark red colour. Her round face with short, pointed nose and small mouth was staring back at you with burgundy eyes. She was dressed in a dark green t-shirt with purple highlights around the neck and arms. Her red shorts were contrasted by a pair of glossy, dark green flats with little yellow gems on the toe. Her legs were shaved and bare and on her hand she had a cherry shaped ring.

You back up against the wall, aghast at your new reflection and how short it was. Though you could tell that the body in the reflection was not out of shape it was nothing like your hulking mass of muscle and bone you'd been before. Panicking, you wish you had something to eat to take your mind of of things. Suddenly something rather amazing happens, a cherry grows and ripens in your new hair over the course of a few seconds.

You reach up with your thin, tanned, arm and gingerly touch the cherry, confirming that it was real...
1341.title: Cherry

info.brief_description: You and/or some friends gain strange tree-themed powers but the powers come with a price
info.description:
Joshua Tanner one day buys a glass bottle that contains the forms and powers of ancient tree spirits. He then uses the essence of the spirits on waffles and consumes them (either alone or with others). After consuming the essences the person who consumed it gains the power of the spirit they consumed. In the case where someone consumes all the essences they gain the ability to morph between the spirits at will, changing powers depending on which form they had.

The Spirits, their descriptions and their powers are:

Maple:
-Caucasian skinned with bright red hair, average height & perfect curves, always dressed in red clothes that look vaguely like they are made from maple leaves
-Can generate energy based shields in the form of huge maple leaves

Willow:
-Caucasian Skinned with Brown hair, tall and heavy build, dresses in greens and browns
-Can grow vine-like branches from hair and arms for use in tying things up/constricting them

Spruce:
-Tanned skin with deep with forest green hair, very tall and thin, always dressed in varying shades of green
-Can fire large masses of steel strength spruce needles from hands at bullet like velocities

Poplar:
-Caucasian skinned with blonde hair, Average height and build, usually dresses in greens and yellows/oranges
-Can generate a cloud of pollen that can be used to knock out those without Spirit powers or to escape in

Birch:
-Pale skinned with yellow-white hair, very thin but not as tall as spruce, at least one item of clothing is white
-Can change appearance to any female form (excluding the form of the other spirits) but must always be wearing one piece of white clothing

Cherry:
-Tanned skin with dark red hair, short and fit, usually wears reds and greens with some purple and yellow
-Can grow cherries from hair that can be either eaten for food or used as grenades

Palm:
-Dark skinned with thick black hair, average height and build, Usually wears tan or green clothes
-Can generate a single club made out of indestructible coconuts as well as a shield made from steel-like palm leaves. Can also call back the shield and club to her hands at any time.

Bamboo:
-East asian skin tone and silky black hair, short and thin, most varied selection of clothes
-Can generate unlimited supply of bamboo spears for throwing, etc. and can dodge attacks well

Baobab:
-Very Dark Skinned with Dark hair, Average height but slightly overweight, usually dresses in yellows and tan colours with some hints of red
-Is invulnerable to most attacks and can regenerate from those that do cause damage

Eucalyptus:
- Pale skinned with blue-green hair, Average height and hourglass shaped body, Dresses in blue-greens, reds and deep blues
-Can produce potions for uses such as: Healing, poisoning and burning through things

Also: All the spirits can tell the emotions of trees & bushes and carry on small talk with them.

Special note: Only 1 storyline has Joshua having more than one spirit's power. All the others are 1 person per spirit/power

Basic rules:
1. No other powers or spirits than those listed above
2. Keep it PG-13 rating (yes, PG-13)
3. No returning to their original forms/losing the powers
Do understand that I reserve the right to modify or delete chapters that do not follow these 3 guidelines

Some characters (feel free to add more):
Anabelle: Joshua's Girlfriend
Kyle: Joshua's Best Friend
Lucy: Kyle's Sister
Jason: Joshua's popular friend
Carla: Jason's Girlfriend
Mike: Least social of Joshua's friends
Bill: Joshua's Athletic friend
Jake: Joshua's least athletic friend
Charles: Joshua's Neighbour
Joshua's Family: (surname: Tanner)
Tom Jr.: Joshua's older brother
Samantha & Alexandria: Joshua's younger twin sisters (1 year younger than Joshua)
Adam: Joshua's kid brother
Christine: Joshua's Mother
Tom Sr.: Joshua's Father
Richard: Joshua's uncle
Chen: Richard's adopted son
Maria: Joshua's grandmother

Please add and I hope you enjoy the story
